name: string-filter-query
description: Filters based on a string column. Requires a column, an operator, and a list of values.

column.description: The column to apply filter for. Choose an appropriate column name based on user input from filterable_columns.string list.

operator.description: The filter operator. '=' means equals to. '!=' means not equals to. For 'is-empty' and 'not-empty' operators set an empty values array. Other operators support multiple values and require a least 1 value to be set.
